mapper.select: select * from PDSCI.PUB_PROJ pp where exists (select null from PDSCI.PUB_PROJ_USER ppu where pp.PROJ_FLOW=ppu.PROJ_FLOW and ppu.USER_FLOW=#{userFlow} and role_flow=#{roleFlow} and ppu.RECORD_STATUS='Y' ) and pp.RECORD_STATUS='Y' and exists(select null from PDSCI.EDC_PROJ_PARAM epp where pp.PROJ_FLOW=epp.PROJ_FLOW and epp.IS_RANDOM='Y' and epp.RECORD_STATUS='Y') order by pp.MODIFY_TIME DESC
select * from PDSCI.PUB_PROJ where RECORD_STATUS='Y' and (proj_status_id = #{projStatusId} or proj_stage_id = #{projStageId}) ORDER BY CREATE_TIME DESC, PROJ_START_TIME DESC, PROJ_END_TIME
